metadata.title: CVE-2015-1430 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in xymon 4.3.17-1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1430` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xymon - 4.3.17-5
xymon-client - 4.3.17-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xymon package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.17-5').
